Getting started

Create a route:

# happy/config/routes.py

'cats/example': {

'controller': '/happy/src/cats/controller/cats_controller.py'

}

Create a controller:

# happy/src/cats/controller/cats_controller.py

from happy.src.cats.model.cats import call_cats

def index():

return call_cats()

Create your business logic:

# happy/src/cats/model/cats.py

# your business logic
